code: var useNote=function useNote(){var defaultNote={id:null,text:'',width:200,height:200,x:0,y:0,type:'',color:''};var updateNote=function updateNote(oldNote,_ref){var id=_ref.id,width=_ref.width,height=_ref.height,x=_ref.x,y=_ref.y,color=_ref.color,text=_ref.text,type=_ref.type;if(typeof width==="string")width=width.replace(/px$/,'');if(typeof height==="string")height=height.replace(/px$/,'');return{id:id||oldNote.id,width:width||oldNote.width,height:height||oldNote.height,x:~x?x:oldNote.x,y:~y?y:oldNote.y,color:color||oldNote.color,text:text||oldNote.text||' ',type:type||null};};var isEqual=function isEqual(oldNote,updatedNote){return oldNote.width===updatedNote.width&&oldNote.height===updatedNote.height&&oldNote.x===updatedNote.x&&oldNote.y===updatedNote.y&&oldNote.color===updatedNote.color&&oldNote.text===updatedNote.text;};return{updateNote:updateNote,defaultNote:defaultNote,isEqual:isEqual};};export default useNote;
